poem.title: Riddle me Ruff and Ree
poem.author: Peter McCarey
poem.text:
A riddle, a tipsy river, again I'll try, but how to be? How does the King of the Sheepfold Sort his species, heck and ree?
The dead can have my residue To bank or bury or sing. Mine is the kingdom of joy and recognition - With no king!
